passportNationality.legend: You can only register if it says ‘British citizen’ in the nationality section of your passport.

criminalConviction.legend: Do you have a criminal record in the UK (including police cautions)?
criminalConviction.label: You don’t need to tell us about motoring fines or penalty points unless these were court imposed.

refusedEntry.legend: Have you ever been refused or had restrictions imposed on your travel from, or back into, the UK?

customsPenalties.legend: Have you ever had action or penalties taken against you for breaking UK customs laws or regulations?

surname.legend: What is your full name as it is written in your passport?
surname.label: Surname

otherNames.legend: Have you ever been officially or legally known by another name?
otherNames.label: For example, you have changed your name by marriage or deed poll

gender.legend: What is your gender as it is written in your passport?
